title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
hi. i have here water damage board 820-3332-a no powering up missing PPBUS_G3H.
changed u7000 but still nothing.

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message: when i connect charger. green light is on the red after 5 second is off

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
resistance between pin 27 and 28 on u7000 - 20.7 Ohm
resistance between pin 17 and 18 on U7000 - 3.9 Ohm
R7005 pin 1 - 20v and pin 2 - 17.18v
U7000 pin 3 - 4.65v
U7000 pin 19 - 5.45v
U7000 pin 14 - 0.73v
not sure what should i check more or how to fix this board. anybody can help me here please? Will be much appriciate

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message: U7000 getting hot. Board consume 0.99 amp on power supply

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
U7000 shouldn't get hot.

"changed u7000"
Which was the reason to change it?

Resistance to ground (diode mode) at L7030?
Do you get steady 3V42 and SMC_RESET_L?

Check Q7030/35and C7025.

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
SMC_RESET_L  - 3.25v
steady 3v42
ressistance to ground on L7030 - 1.6 OHM
also i change c7025 and change Q7030/35

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
"ressistance to ground on L7030 - 1.6 OHM"
So you powered up a shorted board...
Remove F7040/41 and see where the short remains.
Do NOT power the board again, until short is gone.

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message: F7040/41 removed and  pin 2 is  1.6ohm  pin 1 15 kohm

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
So the short is on the system side.
Now check which big coil gest the same value (1.6 ohm) to ground.
Start with L7510/20/30 and L7550/60.

title: 820-3332-a no power up missing PPBUS_G3H
message:
Check which one gives lower ohm value to PPBUS_G3H.
That one will disclose the burnt high-side MOSFET.
In fact these coils are in group of 2-3.
If you get 3-3.5 ohms is OK.
Less than 0.5 ohm will point you to the culprit.
After that, measure G-S ohm value for the respective MOSFETs of the group.
Usually one from 2, or 3 connected in the same rail is shorted.
